description:
Brijesh is given an unsorted array *nums* , he has to print the smallest missing positive number.
He is not good in coding so he need your help  to do so.

**You must implement an algorithm that runs in O(n) time and uses constant extra space.**

####Input Format:
*First line contains single integer *n* (size of the element)
*second line contains n single space separated integers (element of the array)

####Output Format:
*Print the single integer i.e. the smallest missing positive integer

####Example:
**Input**:3
1 2 0
**Output**: 3 

####Constraints:
*1 <= n <= 10^5
*-(2^31) <= nums[i] <= (2^31) - 1
title: First Missing Positive
